Reviews.Title: Best ever
Reviews.Author: Jphilip66 "phil@philstarr.com"
Reviews.Content: I have used Casio point and shoot cameras for at least 10 years. This is my latest camera chosen because of the speed or interval between shots is really fast. There is a burst mode as well as the traditional feature of 3 timer shots which is helpful when trying to catch children with their eyes open. I wish there was an optical viewfinder ( Casio used to make one) but all compact cameras have abandoned the optical in lies of a larger LCD screen. So far I am really pleased with this Casio.

Reviews.Title: Perfect and Easy
Reviews.Author: L. Wagoner "Emmalyn's Mommy"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. I bought a Nikon CoolPix to replace my former Casio and what a mistake! I immediately found the new version of my old beloved Casio and haven't looked back. The shutter speed it remarkably fast for a point and shoot and with so many options! Casio has a loyal customer for life.

Reviews.Title: great vslue
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I have always loved Casio's cameras and this one doesn't disappoint. Easy to use and has the features I need.
